definitions.definition: To take part in a private military action in a foreign country .
To use obstructionist tactics in a legislative body.
definitions.label_groups: originally and chiefly US politics , intransitive , transitive

main_definition: To take part in a private military action in a foreign country .
secondary_definitions: ( originally and chiefly US politics , intransitive , transitive ) To use obstructionist tactics in a legislative body.
